perf: Fix TextInput lag with debounced inputs for faster typing

## Problem
- All TextInput fields were updating form state on every keystroke
- Caused severe lag when typing quickly in text fields
- RichTextEditor (TipTap) had no lag because it already uses debouncing
- User experience was poor with character skipping and delays

## Solution: Debounced Text Inputs
- Applied DebouncedTextInput component to all major text input fields
- Uses local state + useDebouncedCallback (300ms delay)
- Form updates only after user stops typing (300ms pause)
- Prevents expensive re-renders on every keystroke

## Files Updated

### LocationSection.jsx
- Street Address, Address Line 2, City, County, ZIP Code
- All address fields now use DebouncedTextInput
- Parking location name fields kept as regular TextInput (less frequent use)

### ContactSection.jsx
- All contact fields debounced (8 fields total):
  - Organizer Name (Events)
  - Website, Phone Number, Email
  - Instagram, Facebook, X, TikTok, LinkedIn

### CoreInformationSection.jsx
- Status Message field (100 char limit)
- Event Cost and Ticket Link fields

### helpers.js
- Updated getControlledInputProps with better onChange handling
- getDebouncedInputProps already existed and ready to use
- Note added about using DebouncedTextInput for text fields

## Technical Details

### DebouncedTextInput Component (already existed)
- Maintains internal state for instant UI feedback
- Debounces form updates with useDebouncedCallback
- Syncs external value changes properly
- 300ms debounce delay (optimal for typing speed)

### Fields NOT Changed
- Image upload placeholder TextInputs (rarely used)
- NumberInput fields (different performance characteristics)
- Select dropdowns (no typing lag)
- RichTextEditor fields (already debounced)

## Results

### Performance Improvements
- No more typing lag in text fields
- Instant character display (local state)
- Form updates efficiently after typing pause
- Matches RichTextEditor smooth experience

### User Experience
- Can type at full speed without lag
- No more character deletion or skipping
- Smooth, responsive text inputs
- Professional typing experience

### Code Quality
- Reused existing DebouncedTextInput component
- Consistent pattern across all text inputs
- Helper functions support both patterns
- Easy to extend to remaining fields if needed

## Fields Updated (17 total)
- 5 address fields (LocationSection)
- 8 contact/social fields (ContactSection)
- 1 status field (CoreInformationSection)
- 3 event fields (CoreInformationSection)

## Testing
- Frontend builds successfully
- No console errors
- All debounced fields render correctly
- Form submission preserves all data
- Typing is now smooth and responsive

## Future Improvements
If lag persists in other sections, can extend to:
- BusinessDetailsSection (pricing, hours fields)
- FacilitiesSection (rental pricing, links)
- TrailSpecificSections (route info fields)
- EventSpecificSections (vendor fields)
